SEARCH

Package handlers

package handlers
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AppointmentHandler
    Handles the management of appointments in the system, including scheduling, rescheduling, viewing, recording, and canceling appointments.
    CSVHandler
    Utility class for handling reading and writing of CSV files.
    InventoryHandler
    Handles inventory-related tasks such as saving replenishment requests to a CSV file.
    LoginHandler
    Handles user login and authentication for the hospital management system.
    MedicalCertificateHandler
    Handles the operations related to managing medical certificates, including loading, saving, viewing, and updating their statuses.
    MedicineHandler
    Handles the loading and saving of the medicine list from and to a CSV file.
    PasswordHash
    Provides a method for hashing passwords using the SHA-256 algorithm.
    PatientHandler
    Handles operations related to managing patient data, such as loading, saving, and retrieving patients.
    StaffHandler
    Handles operations related to managing staff data, such as loading, saving, adding, and removing staff members.
    TextHandler
    Utility class for reading from and writing to text files.
